level.heading: Persons acting as auctioneers.
level.text: ยง 20-281 Persons acting as auctioneers. It shall be unlawful for any person not licensed as an auctioneer to represent or circulate or place before the public any announcement, or to insert or cause to be inserted in any city, business or telephone directory, any notice that he or she is conducting the business of auctioneering.
